docs.snippet: The Giants’ star quarterback, who sustained a left ankle sprain, had an arthroscopic procedure and said he expected to start running in late May....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Giants’ star quarterback, who sustained a left ankle sprain, had an arthroscopic procedure and said he expected to start running in late May.
docs.abstract: New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning has arthroscopic surgery on his left ankle to relieve pain associated with a sprain he sustained in the last game of 2013 season; says that he expects to take part in the team’s off-season program in April but will not start running until late May.

headline.main: Eli Manning Has Surgery on Ankle He Injured in Season Finale
